kanduboda siyana wipassana jathyanthara bhawana madhyasthanaye aarambhaye sita me dakwa wasara panashayak des wides yogawachara bhikshu bhikshunin wenuwen siwupasayen apa upasthana kaladayaka pinwathun desiya panasdenaku angayamin owunta sannas pathra pradanaya kirima shri lanka amarapura sangha sabhawe sabhapathi aggamaha panditha kotugoda dhammawasa anunahimiyan athin pasugiyada siduwiya.kanduboda siyana wipassana jathyanthara bhawana madhyasthanadhipathi shri lanka shwejin nikaye maha nayaka maha kammattanacharya iguruwaththe piyananda nahimipanange manga penwima yatathe diyasenpura wimalahimipanan athulu wiharasthadayaka sabhawe sanwidhayakathwayen pawathi mema pinkama wenuwen kolambaa sambodhi wiharadhipathi daranagama kusaladhamma , kanduboda shri sumathipala senasun aranehi anushasaka pradhana kammattanacharya gampaha pemasiri, buthpitiye samitha yana nayaka swaminwahanse yuda hamuda manowaidya eekakaye adhyaksha janaral brigediyar rohana bandara athulu gihi pawidi wishala pirisak sahabhagi wuha.mehidi anushasanawak kala kotugoda dhammawasa anunayaka himiyo mese kiha.kanduboda jathyanthara wipassana bhawana madhyasthanaya ape rate widarshana bhawana kramaya wyaptha kirimata mulwu aayathanaya wanawasema me rate nathi wi giya widarshana bhawana margaya nawatha handunwa dun aayathanaya wanawa.1956 warshaye ewakata agamathi shrimathi jon kothalawala buruma jathika uu sho, uu sujatha, kahatapitiye siri sumathipala nahimiwarunge mulikathwayen me madhyasthanaya aarambha wuna.
